mapper.select: SELECT id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_info, head_img, create_time FROM sys_user

SELECT r.id, r.role_name, r.enabled, r.create_by, r.create_time FROM sys_user u JOIN sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id JOIN sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND r.enabled = #{enabled}
